name: Solland
description: Solland is the first Web3 Game that combines the AI Price Predictions Oracle. Players enjoy idle mining gameplay to earn mining resources that can be exchanged for tokens through the AI Price Predictions Oracle. Invite friends to receive more rewards and opportunities to accelerate earnings through the Loyalty Point System. Web3 Mining Game x AI on Solana | A community project for relaxation & profitability | Don't miss the Testnet Campaign
